title: Rustic lamb chop hotpot
ingredients: ['8 large lamb chops', '3 tablespoons plain flour', 'salt and pepper, to taste', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '3 large onions, roughly chopped', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh rosemary', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '900g potatoes, sliced thinly', '600ml hot lamb stock', '2 tablespoons butter']
